titles.title: Military and Civilian Victims Payroll Tax Relief Act of 2001
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide income and employment tax relief for military and civilian victims of terroristic or military action.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 12/13/2001--Introduced. Military and Civilian Victims Payroll Tax Relief Act of 2001 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt from income and employment taxes any individual who dies as a result of wounds, injury, or illness incurred as a result of terroristic or military action.
